nodes.bodyText: We don't have mininet and topology-engine... Is this network.disco.make actual at al?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -46,7 +46,7 @@ help:

 	#     up the remaining containers
-	OK_TESTS="DISABLE_LOGIN" docker-compose up -d mininet floodlight storm-supervisor \
+	docker-compose up -d mininet floodlight storm-supervisor \

nodes.bodyText: looks like it's not actual > 1 year :(
